include_dependencies.description: Whether to include dependencies or not.

executable.description: Override the path to the gem executable

name.description: The name of the gem to be managed.

repository.description: The repository from which the gem will be installed

build_flags.description: Allow adding build flags for gem compilation

user_install.description: Install gem in user's local gems cache or for all users

pre_release.description: Allow installation of pre-release versions of the gem.

env_shebang.description: Rewrite the shebang line on installed scripts to use /usr/bin/env.

state.description: The desired state of the gem. C(latest) ensures that the latest version is installed.

version.description: Version of the gem to be installed/removed.

gem_source.description: The path to a local gem used as installation source.
